name: POMP
description:
Hey, Hi! haven't you played Pomp yet?
Pomp is a hilarious retro style game.
Available for Android (Google Play Store), Windows and Linux.
Enjoy it!

Instructions:

Catch the pomps and save yourself from the droids:
Catch the pomps to get points.
Save yourself from the droids (jump, defend yourself or if you are in trouble, drop a bomb).
There are several types of reward. Catch five to level up.
There are eight levels!
